org.smartfrog.services.xml.utils
Interface XmlConstants

All Known Implementing Classes:
ParserHelper
public interface XmlConstants

General definition of various XML constants, usually parser options but also classnames and things. Somewhat Xerces-specific. created 17-May-2005 15:14:18
